input_text:
Job Title: Senior Back-end Software Engineer (Contract) (Hybrid) â€“ 4314

Location: Irvine, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
HireClout

A leading security and facility services company that uses cutting-edge smart technology to deliver evolving, tailored solutions that allows clients to focus on their core business. Operating in more than 90 countries with a global workforce of approximately 800,000 people. Employees help to deliver company promises globally and locally: keeping people safe so customers and communities can thrive.

What You Will Be Doing

Valuable contributor to a diverse engineering team, focusing on systems thinking, SOLID principles, coding standards, and testing. Assume complete end-to-end technical and engineering responsibility for one or more applications. Lead the translation of complex functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design. Define solutions in terms of components, modules, and algorithms. Develop and implement the proposed solutions. Refactor existing solutions to enhance reusability and scalability. Lead or support discussions on applying existing or new technology to meet business needs. Generate design documents, code, and unit/functional tests, as well as improvements, modifications, and fixes to existing code. Justify and defend design decisions. Identify opportunities for further improvements and refinements to standards, processes, and systems. Emphasize creative thinking, coding for future needs rather than current requirements. 

What You Will Need

5-7 years of experience or 3-5 years with a BS in Computer Science, Information Systems, or Data Science Extensive Agile team experience. Proficient in Java/J2EE, Spring, Nodejs/Typescript, and/or Python for design and coding. Strong familiarity and use of Git and Jira. Practical experience with REST/API web services. Proficiency in modern Agile Software Development practices. Familiarity with database technologies like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQL Server. Experience with Microservices architecture. Skilled in writing tests (Unit, Integration, Load, End-to-End) using Java/JavaScript testing frameworks. Familiarity with dependency frameworks such as Maven, NPM, etc. Knowledge of AWS Services including S3, EC2, Cognito, SMS/SQS, CloudWatch, etc. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to resolve critical issues in complex systems within tight deadlines. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong planning and organizational abilities. Capable of writing technical design and build documentation for all aspects of a technical infrastructure. Good interpersonal and facilitation skills. 

Nice to Have

Familiarity with React, Angular, Vue, or other UI frameworks. Familiarity with container technologies like Docker and Kubernetes. Experience with streaming/messaging technologies such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS, and SNS. Experience with NoSQL databases like Redis, ElastiCache, and MongoDB. 

Why Us

Benefits And Perks

Competitive pay : $60-$90/hr. Medical Dental Vision 401K 

Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.

This position does not offer sponsorship.

REF: JOB-4314

Share this job
